suppress.notes: This shall be handled by https://chromaway.atlassian.net/browse/POS-628 file name: snakeyaml-1.33.jar
False positive. This is actually a problem with json-java which we do not use. file name: jackson-core-2.14.0.jar

Vulnerability in Guava if using com.google.common.io.Files.createTempDir. No version exists without this vulnerability but the function is marked as deprecated in version 30+ We do not use this function in the code so handled as false positive. file name: guava-31.1-jre.jar
